joining chain from the previous 6 round 3 repeat row 2 7 4 repeat row 2 8 5 continue to work even single_crochet in each single_crochet around until you have 13 rounds 8 13 bind off leaving a long tail of yarn to sew the tail to the body later stuff the tail fully sometimes i just stuff the tip and leave the rest flat when sewing the tail on to the animal later on sometimes i sew it on round
